doc.title: Bugs Bunny in Double Trouble
doc.plot: Bugs Bunny falls asleep, and in his dream sees Yosemite Sam developing a robot called Gossamer. The robot disobeys the commands of his master and goes out of control. Now Bugs Bunny has to enter the TV world and to correct things, bringing order back to the lives of Looney Tunes inhabitants. The game consists of several platform-based stages, each one having a different goal. Bugs Bunny can jump and run quickly, as well as collect items and throw them at enemies.
